title: Ah-Harr! - The Ultimate Pirate Memory Matching Card Game for kids and adult pirates
features: The Ultimate Memory Game with pirates, buried treasure maps, parrots, jewels and mutiny on the pirate ship.
Every card can be matched in 3 different ways - color, number or object. Find & Turn 3 cards with a common matching characteristic to make a set to add to your loot.
Quick, simple and cards with special powers mean it is so much more than your standard pairs or memory matching game.
With five alternative ways to play there is endless fun to be had with this addictive card game, that will get you all totally hooked!
"A pirate plundering, parrot pinching, treasure taking, memory mastering fun family game".
description: From the manufacturer "A pirate plundering, parrot pinching, treasure taking, memory mastering fun family game". Every card can be matched in 3 different ways - colour, number or object. Great for improving memory and concentration Ah-Harr! - The Ultimate Pirate Memory Matching Card Game for kids and adult pirates Memory Game with pirates, buried treasure maps, parrots, jewels and mutiny on the pirate ship Every card can be matched in 3 different ways - colour, number or object. Find & Turn 3 cards with a common matching characteristic to make a set to add to your loot. Quick, simple and cards with special powers mean it is so much more than your standard pairs or memory matching game. With five alternative ways to play there is endless fun to be had with this addictive card game, that will get you all totally hooked! Ahoy there. Legend says that Blackbeard, the most dastardly pirate of the Caribbean, buried his hoard of precious jewels on Treasure Island. Your pirate captain has taken you to the secret location of the island and now you must race your crew mates to find the most treasure. Beware though; Blackbeard’s curse says that things can only be removed from the island in matching sets of three . Search the island for rubies, emeralds and sapphires to add to your own booty pile and use treasure maps to help you on your quest. Send parrots to plunder jewels from other pirates and lead a mutiny to become the new pirate captain and wear the captain’s eye patch. Every card can be matched in three different ways - colour, number or object . Finding three cards with a common matching characteristic allows you to remove the cards from Treasure Island to your booty pile. Keep track of revealed cards and remember who has found which jewels, so that you can use your parrots to steal them in this constantly changing game. The player with the most jewels in their booty at the end of the game rules the seven seas. Ah-Harr! Play Simple triple matching game or Advanced Game loved by kids where cards have special powers:- Buried Treasure In Advanced Game Jewel Cards count as your points at the end of the game. (eg: this card has 4 jewels so is worth 4 points) Stealing Loot In Advanced Game use Parrot Cards in a matching set to steal jewels of the same colour from another pirate. (Eg: red parrots can steal red jewels) Mutiny & Protection In Advanced Game Use Skull & Crossbones Cards in a matching set to lead a mutiny, take the eye patch and become the new pirate captain. No parrots can steal jewels from the captain. Treasure Maps Search In Advanced Game finding a Map Card allows you to search again (ie: turn over one extra card). This will increase your chances of making a matching set. With five alternative ways to play there is endless fun to be had with this addictive game, that you will want to play again and again. Quick, simple and cards with special powers mean it is so much more than your standard memory matching game or pairs game. It’s triple the fun and will get you all totally hooked! Ah-Harr! - The Ultimate Pirate Memory Game
